panels.title: ðŸš€ Real-time Request Volume
panels.query: from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "api_logs") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: count, createEmpty: false) |> yield(name: "requests_per_second")
panels.description: Live stream of API requests per time window

panels.title: âš¡ Response Time Distribution
panels.query: from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "api_logs" and r._field == "latency_ms") |> histogram(bins: [0, 100, 250, 500, 1000, 2000])
panels.description: Distribution of response times across different latency buckets

panels.title: ðŸŽ¯ Success vs Error Rates
panels.query: from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "api_logs") |> group(columns: ["status_code"]) |> count() |> group() |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with status_category: if r.status_code < "400" then "Success" else "Error"}))
panels.description: Breakdown of successful vs failed requests

panels.title: ðŸ”¥ Top API Endpoints
panels.query: from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "api_logs") |> group(columns: ["api"]) |> count() |> group() |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true) |> limit(n: 10)

panels.title: âš ï¸ Error Rate Over Time
panels.query: from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "api_logs") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: count) |> group(columns: ["status_code"]) |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with is_error: if r.status_code >= "400" then r._value else 0})) |> sum(column: "is_error")
panels.description: Track error rates with alert thresholds

panels.title: ðŸ“Š P95 Response Time
panels.query: from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "api_logs" and r._field == "latency_ms") |> quantile(q: 0.95)
panels.description: 95th percentile response time with SLA thresholds

panels.title: ðŸŒŠ Request Volume Heatmap
panels.query: from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "api_logs") |> group(columns: ["api", "method"]) |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: count)
panels.description: Visualize request patterns across endpoints and methods

panels.title: ðŸŽ­ Status Code Distribution
panels.query: from(bucket: "my-bucket") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "api_logs") |> group(columns: ["status_code"]) |> count() |> group() |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
